alert.note: Alert for Barton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 4:27PM CDT until May 09 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Barton County in central Kansas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 427 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Great Bend, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Great Bend, Ellinwood and Great Bend Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
